title: The best method for finding high yields—while lowering risk (Ep. 693)
itunes:title: The best method for finding high yields—while lowering risk
description: Marc Lichtenfeld is an income investment specialist. He literally wrote the book on the topic: Get Rich with Dividends: A Proven System for Earning Double-Digit Returns. On this episode, Marc shares his methodology for finding the best income investments that also lower risk—including MLPs, REITs, ETFs, dividend stocks, and even bonds. He also shares a couple of his favorite ideas right now… and some high-dividend companies to avoid [18:22].  Over half of the companies in the S&P 500 have reported third quarter earnings. In my educational segment, I break down my thoughts on the earnings season—including some names I’d buy… or sell [47:43]. -------------- Editor’s note: WSU regular Rich Suttmeier is about to launch the first Curzio trading advisory, 2-Second Trader. Based off his wildly popular Chart of the Week, the strategy will take literally 2 seconds… and almost zero effort.
